abstract: The de facto first lady of New York, appearing on a panel about women's economic empowerment, directed her attention not to "glass ceilings" but to the advantages of being a woman in the marketplace.
snippet: The de facto first lady of New York, appearing on a panel about women's economic empowerment, directed her attention not to "glass ceilings" but to the advantages of being a woman in the marketplace.

headline.main: Sandra Lee Opens Up on Life With Cuomo and Offers Career Advice
headline.print_headline: Sandra Lee Shares Tips, But Subject Is Not Food
